column4: Can anyone help me with BIND? I have a small lan with a BIND server, gateway server and a client. BIND runs without errors when I do a nslookup on one of the servers I get this:
I type nslookup gateway.bed.local and it responses with bed.local.bed.local .. why?
do youhave your nameserver in /etc/resolv.conf? and when there is a search entry, it will also try to find your computers with that text appended to the name.
